list.name: Changes
list.comment:
feat: update page templates configuration instructions
- Add template specification in Front Matter for categories, tags, masonry - Clarify navbar configuration for adding pages to navigation - Remove outdated instructions for customizing page titles - Update examples with consistent formatting across languages - Simplify and standardize setup steps for all page templates

task.summary: Default task
fix build failed

feat: Update image imports in index pages (main)
- Update image imports in pages/index.en.mdx and pages/index.zh.mdx - Replace the previous image paths with the new image paths - Use the new image files: docs-light.webp and docs-dark.webp - This commit is part of the main branch.

feat: Update configurations and dependencies
- Rearrange 'images' and 'i18n' within 'next.config.js' for better readability - Remove commented out 'defaultShowCopyCode' and 'baseUrl' from 'next.config.js' - Fix trailing comma in '_meta.en.json' - Simplify 'footer' in 'theme.config.tsx' to only include text - Update '@vercel/analytics', 'framer-motion', 'next', 'nextra', 'nextra-theme-docs', and 'ts-node' versions in 'package.json' - Update '@types/node', 'autoprefixer', 'postcss', 'tailwindcss', and 'typescript' versions in 'package.json' - Remove unused 'repository', 'author', 'license', 'bugs', and 'homepage' from 'package.json'
docs: update license type in acknowledgements page for both English and Chinese versions

chore: update project dependencies
This update involves updating the `next` package from version 13.4.19 to 13.5.6, `nextra` from version 2.13.2 to 2.13.3, and `nextra-theme-docs` from version 2.13.2 to 2.13.3 in the project's `package.json` file. The changes also reflect in the `pnpm-lock.yaml` file.
feat: add search placeholder to theme configuration
feat: integrate custom analytics script into _app.mdx

fix: Update navbar configuration in documentation
- Replace 'categories' with 'links' in _config.redefine.yml examples - Update both Chinese and English versions of the categories page template
feat: migrate to nextra v4
feat: animation

feat: enhance layout and footer design
- Update footer with copyright and project information - Add PromoCard component to table of contents - Adjust navbar and layout configurations - Remove placeholder cat image from TOC extra content

style: Remove background and border styles from features container
- Remove background color and border from features container in light mode - Remove background color and border from features container in dark mode - Adjust styles in both en-index.tsx and zh-index.tsx files

docs: Update README with project details and documentation link
- Add information about the build technology (Nextra 4 App Router) - Include link to the hexo-theme-redefine repository - Add link to the live documentation website

feat: Add sitemap generation and configuration
- Implement next-sitemap for automatic sitemap generation - Add next-sitemap configuration file with site URL and robots.txt settings - Update build script to include sitemap generation - Enable pre/post scripts in npm configuration

refactor: Improve middleware and locale handling
- Enhance type safety in getLocale function - Adjust matcher to exclude sitemap from middleware processing - Format code for better readability

style: Update favicon and app icons
- Replace safari-pinned-tab.svg with a simplified version - Update favicon.ico and apple-icon.png with new designs - Refresh Android Chrome icons for better visual consistency

feat: Enhance documentation with visual aids and navigation
- Add images to various sections for better visual explanation - Implement Cards component for easier navigation between sections - Update content structure for improved readability - Add icons to Cards for better visual cues - Improve formatting and layout of code examples and tables

style: Improve formatting and readability of getting-started.mdx
- Remove unnecessary newlines and adjust indentation - Simplify Callout component usage - Standardize YAML example formatting - Enhance overall document structure for better readability

refactor: Enhance locale handling and error management in middleware
- Add validation for locales and default locale - Implement error handling for locale matching - Improve logging for better debugging - Ensure fallback to default locale on error - Update redirect example comment for clarity

chore: Remove next-sitemap from postbuild script
- Simplify postbuild process by removing next-sitemap execution - Retain pagefind functionality for site search capabilities - Update package.json to reflect the streamlined build process

feat: Add analytics script to layout
- Integrate analytics script using Next.js Script component - Set script to load deferred for improved performance - Include website ID for tracking purposes

feat: Add categories page template and update navbar configuration
- Create categories page template in Chinese - Add instructions for enabling categories page in theme configuration - Update YAML example for navbar configuration with proper indentation - Improve readability of configuration instructions

MESSAGE.value:
feat: Update image imports in index pages (main)
- Update image imports in pages/index.en.mdx and pages/index.zh.mdx - Replace the previous image paths with the new image paths - Use the new image files: docs-light.webp and docs-dark.webp - This commit is part of the main branch.

feat: Update configurations and dependencies
- Rearrange 'images' and 'i18n' within 'next.config.js' for better readability - Remove commented out 'defaultShowCopyCode' and 'baseUrl' from 'next.config.js' - Fix trailing comma in '_meta.en.json' - Simplify 'footer' in 'theme.config.tsx' to only include text - Update '@vercel/analytics', 'framer-motion', 'next', 'nextra', 'nextra-theme-docs', and 'ts-node' versions in 'package.json' - Update '@types/node', 'autoprefixer', 'postcss', 'tailwindcss', and 'typescript' versions in 'package.json' - Remove unused 'repository', 'author', 'license', 'bugs', and 'homepage' from 'package.json'
docs: update license type in acknowledgements page for both English and Chinese versions

This update involves updating the `next` package from version 13.4.19 to 13.5.6, `nextra` from version 2.13.2 to 2.13.3, and `nextra-theme-docs` from version 2.13.2 to 2.13.3 in the project's `package.json` file. The changes also reflect in the `pnpm-lock.yaml` file.

feat: integrate custom analytics script into _app.mdx

- Replace 'categories' with 'links' in _config.redefine.yml examples - Update both Chinese and English versions of the categories page template
feat: migrate to nextra v4
